use globalmart_db
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.customers
(
    customer_id VARCHAR(100),
    customer_email VARCHAR(255),
    customer_name VARCHAR(100),
    segment VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(100),
    postal_code INT,
    region VARCHAR(100) )
with(
    LOCATION='customers.csv',
    data_source=ADLSDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT=csv_file_format,
    reject_value=10,
    rejected_row_location='rejections/customers'
);

select top 10* from bronze.customers

use globalmart_db
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.orders
(
    order_id varchar(100),
    customer_id varchar(100),
    vendor_id varchar(100),
    ship_mode varchar(100),
    order_status varchar(100),
    order_purchase_date VARCHAR(50),
    order_approved_at VARCHAR(50),
    order_delivered_carrier_date VARCHAR(50),
    order_delivered_customer_date VARCHAR(50),
    order_estimated_delivery_date VARCHAR(50) )
with(
    LOCATION='orders.csv',
    data_source=ADLSDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT=csv_file_format,
    reject_value=10,
    rejected_row_location='rejections/orders'
);

select * from bronze.orders
